name: AIWIS
author: ITkamer

sections.description:
Aiwis will help you to transform simple visitors into valuable customers.
Aiwis uses Cookies when testing your Aiwis on websites, please ensure to delete cookies for the websites.

Give Your Customers The Experience Of A Lifetime… And Watch FRESH Leads And Sales Flood In

COMING SOON: Facebook Integration – We’re just improving a few minor parts and Facebook integration with Aiwis is all possible

  • Intelligent voice message in 20 languages
  • Decides the flow of the messages per pages
  • Location of your visitors
  • Send message depending of the returned visitor
  • Change position of the robot depending of visits and pages
  • Change colors of robot
  • Collect the name and email of your audiences and directly push them to your autoresponder

See more at aiwis.io
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-aiwis.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create a new project and get his Script ID.
  4. Enter the script Id on the settings of wp-aiwis plugin and save it
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload wp-aiwis.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create a new project and get his Script ID.
  4. Enter the script Id on the settings of wp-aiwis plugin and save it

A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.

How does AIWIS know my customer’s name?

AIWIS is passed information from the autoresponder (if your customer arrived through an e-mail link) or from Facebook (if they didn’t).
So when you use the [NAME] shortcode in your AIWIS message, it’ll just be replaced witht he actual name of your prospect.

How to start using AIWIS?

Go through this (link)[https://sales.aiwis.io/#startnow]

short_description: AIWIS is the World’s Most Advanced Artificial Intelligence Website Interaction System. He talks with your visitors in many different languages.
